resources.string: Are your wheels an accurate window to who you really are? Shed some light on how different types of bikes may reflect your personality.
1. When you are stuck in traffic, you
2. When facing a big project, your first step is to
3. Do you act very differently at work or school than when you are at home?
4. What is your favourite way to relax?
5. When it comes to dining out, how do you usually choose a restaurant?
6. Which two adjectives best describe your personality at work?
7. Which best describes your bedroom right now?
8. When buying a birthday gift for a friend you pick
9. Your perfect vacation right now involves
10. Select all the items that best describe your behaviour:
Maybe a little bit at first, but then I warm up
No, I\'m always myself no matter where I am
I only relax when I\'m asleep
Read a good book or surf the net
I go by recommendation from friends
Let\'s mix it up! I want to go to places I\'ve never tried before
A gift card so they can choose
Something expensive and of high quality
Getting somewhere secluded and close to nature
An adventure! Heading to a big city and meeting new people
A CRUISER, you are rater laid-back. You embrace carefree days and thoroughly enjoy the sweet, simple things in life.
HYBRID BIKE. You are the person who is ready for anything and everything that your ride route (and life) may throw your way.
ROAD BIKE. Energetic and dedicated, you are both loyal leader and team player. You value endurance and doing what it takes to get a job done-and done right.

BMX BIKE. You are an adrenaline-junkie. You love the spotlight and will often do whatever it takes to maintain your audience, even if it involves some risk. The bigger the thrills and spills, the better!
TREADLE BIKE. You are clearly a trend-setter. You are eccentric and love finding hobbies that set you apart from the crowd.
